subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The 8-year-old Cirrus des Aigles, the leading European-trained money-earner ever, has become a yardstick by which other racehorses are measured.
snippet: The 8-year-old Cirrus des Aigles, the leading European-trained money-earner ever, has become a yardstick by which other racehorses are measured.
